channel.title: Suspected Racist Police Office Charged with Murder
channel.description:
I'm surprised nobody has posted anything on this yet.
In North-Charleston, S.C. Michael T. Slager, a white police officer, was faces murder charges after fatality shooting an [u]unarmed[/u] black man, Walter L. Scott. Below is a video captured by a bystander. [NSFW] [spoiler=Open at your own risk][youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fyHTWZyiBhE[/youtube][/spoiler]
The Supreme Court has held that an officer may use deadly force against a fleeing suspect only when there is probable cause that the suspect “poses a significant threat of death or serious physical injury to the officer or others.”
Walter L. Scott was shot four times in the back. He did not pose a significant threat of death nor was he armed. Mr. Scott initially fled because he had warrants for not paying child support. Slager claims his taser was taken by Scott but is clearly visible at the officers feet. As Slager drew his gun and fired until Scott fell down.
There is so much more to the story and so much speculation.. The text above is a quick overview but you can find more in formation below: [url=http://www.nytimes.com/2015/04/08/us/south-carolina-officer-is-charged-with-murder-in-black-mans-death.html?action=click&contentCollection=U.S.&module=RelatedCoverage&region=Marginalia&pgtype=article]South Carolina Officer Is Charged With Murder of Walter Scott[/url] [url=http://www.nytimes.com/2015/04/14/us/walter-scott-shooting-turns-michael-slager-into-litigant-as-north-charleston-braces-for-suits.html?action=click&contentCollection=U.S.&module=RelatedCoverage&region=Marginalia&pgtype=a]Walter Scott Shooting Seen as Opening for Civil Suits Against North Charleston’s Police Depte Dept[/url]

That’s things like how we handle gun laws. Yes, you have the cases that get huge news about cops killing unarmed people. But those pale in comparison. It’s easy to say “cops kill 900 people per year here and only 5 per year there!”. Or you could say “cops kill 900 suicide bombers per year here and 5 unarmed citizens there”. Without the real details, those tidbits of information mean nothing. Racism isn’t okay and as you can see by the title of this thread the government knows it isnt okay.

I should point out that I came to this thread to defend the generalization being made against police officers. I know there are bad cops. I don’t believe its the majority. Those of you doing the generalizing, I would implore you to go talk to the child or wife or parents of an honest officer than died in the line of duty.
